>
> Hi there,
> I'm trying to write a program which will use He=
ritrix to crawl for semantic web documents, but I'm having difficulty under=
standing what needs to be done to properly run a crawl from Eclipse. I've d=
ownloaded and imported all the necessary files, and have declared an instan=
ce of Heritrix, and my best guess is that before you can run a crawl you ha=
ve to pass it all the arguments that are passed to it when you run Heritrix=
 through the web UI. Could anyone tell me what exactly you need to do befor=
e it will run a crawl and start returning pages? 
> Unless I've totally mis=
understood what needs to be done..
> 
> Any help would be much appreciated.=

>

Thank you all for the replies.
Ah ok, the first String you're passing t=
o the main will be your username:password, but what exactly are the other 3=
? Apologies, I'm very new to this. Eager to learn, though!
I haven't been a=
ble to find any .war files by the name of webui-1.14.3 either.
